GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.29 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
power: supply: wm8350-power: Add missing free in free_charger_irq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 48d23ef90116c8c702bfa4cad93744e4e5588d7d, it was introduced in version v2.6.29 by commit 14431aa0c5a443d13d24e6f865a8838f97dab973. For more details please see the references link.
